Container.Name: ContextMod
Container.Overview: Context Mod (CM) is an event-based, reddit moderation bot built on top of snoowrap and written in typescript. It is designed to help fill in the gaps for automoderator in regard to more complex behavior with a focus on user-history based moderation.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: bot automod moderator reddit snoowrap typescript automation subreddit social media
Container.Requires: Requires a `config.yaml` or `config.json` file to in the Config Path before the container is started. See documentation: https://contextmod.dev/operator/configuration.html#file-configuration-recommended

Config.Name: Internal Data Directory
Config.Description: Internal path to the data directory. Not recommended to change.
